languages.text: Выкрикивая боевые кличи, мы плотным строем бросились на штурм позиций изменников, заливая их огнем. То была страшная атака, но дисциплинарные офицеры гнали нас вперед ударами электрохлыстов и выстрелами в затылки убоявшихся.

traits.locale_text: Раз уж нам все равно было суждено подохнуть, то Лорд-капитан приказал сделать это с пользой. Отвлечь одних сверхлюдей, чтобы другие могли ударить им в спину.

languages.text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.
languages.original_text: Выкрикивая боевые кличи, мы плотным строем бросились на штурм позиций изменников, заливая их огнем. То была страшная атака, но дисциплинарные офицеры гнали нас вперед ударами электрохлыстов и выстрелами в затылки убоявшихся.

traits.locale_text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

languages.text: 在低沉的战斗呐喊声中，我们集结成密集阵型，朝叛徒们的阵地发起了猛攻，向敌人倾泻着火力。尽管敌人令我们望而生畏，但身后的督军逼迫我们不断前进。他们手中挥舞着噼啪作响的电鞭，若是看到谁有逃跑的打算，就直接一枪射穿他们的后脑。
languages.original_text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

traits.locale_text: 在低沉的战斗呐喊声中，我们集结成密集阵型，朝叛徒们的阵地发起了猛攻，向敌人倾泻着火力。尽管敌人令我们望而生畏，但身后的督军逼迫我们不断前进。他们手中挥舞着噼啪作响的电鞭，若是看到谁有逃跑的打算，就直接一枪射穿他们的后脑。

languages.text: Hurlant à pleins poumons, nous avons foncé droit sur les positions des traîtres en formation serrée, les noyant sous une pluie de balles. L'attaque était terrifiante, mais les officiers disciplinaires nous ont poussés à avancer, faisant claquer leurs fouets électriques et abattant d'une balle dans la tête ceux qui manquaient de conviction.
languages.original_text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

traits.locale_text: Hurlant à pleins poumons, nous avons foncé droit sur les positions des traîtres en formation serrée, les noyant sous une pluie de balles. L'attaque était terrifiante, mais les officiers disciplinaires nous ont poussés à avancer, faisant claquer leurs fouets électriques et abattant d'une balle dans la tête ceux qui manquaient de conviction.

languages.text: けたたましい鬨の声を上げながら、私たちは密集隊形で裏切り者の陣地に突入し、敵に砲火を浴びせた。気の遠くなるような攻撃だったが、軍士官たちは我々を前進させ、電気鞭を打ち鳴らし、信念に欠ける者の頭蓋骨を後ろから撃ち抜いた。
languages.original_text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

traits.locale_text: けたたましい鬨の声を上げながら、私たちは密集隊形で裏切り者の陣地に突入し、敵に砲火を浴びせた。気の遠くなるような攻撃だったが、軍士官たちは我々を前進させ、電気鞭を打ち鳴らし、信念に欠ける者の頭蓋骨を後ろから撃ち抜いた。

languages.text: Con gritos de guerra ensordecedores, asaltamos las posiciones de los traidores en formación, haciendo llover muerte sobre nuestros enemigos. Era una tarea abrumadora, pero los oficiales de disciplina nos guiaban, haciendo restallar sus electrolátigos y disparando en la nuca a quienes demostraban su falta de fe.
languages.original_text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

traits.locale_text: Con gritos de guerra ensordecedores, asaltamos las posiciones de los traidores en formación, haciendo llover muerte sobre nuestros enemigos. Era una tarea abrumadora, pero los oficiales de disciplina nos guiaban, haciendo restallar sus electrolátigos y disparando en la nuca a quienes demostraban su falta de fe.

languages.text: Mit dröhnenden Kampfschreien stürmten wir in enger Formation die Stellungen der Verräter und ließen Feuer auf den Feind hinabregnen. Es war ein kühner Angriff, doch die Disziplinaroffiziere trieben uns vorwärts, ließen ihre Elektropeitschen krachen und schossen jedem, der nicht genügend Überzeugung an den Tag legte, eine Kugel in den Hinterkopf.
languages.original_text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.

traits.locale_text: Mit dröhnenden Kampfschreien stürmten wir in enger Formation die Stellungen der Verräter und ließen Feuer auf den Feind hinabregnen. Es war ein kühner Angriff, doch die Disziplinaroffiziere trieben uns vorwärts, ließen ihre Elektropeitschen krachen und schossen jedem, der nicht genügend Überzeugung an den Tag legte, eine Kugel in den Hinterkopf.

languages.text: Yankılanan savaş nidaları eşliğinde hainleri oldukları yerde kıstırıp ateş yağmuruna tuttuk. Gözümüzü korkutan bir saldırıydı ancak disiplin subayları, elektrokamçılarını kullanıp bizi ilerlemeye zorladı. Geri adım atmaya kalkanları enselerinden vururken gözlerini dahi kırpmadılar.
languages.original_text: With booming battle cries, we stormed the traitors' positions in a tight formation, raining fire upon the enemy. It was a daunting attack, but the disciplinary officers drove us forward, cracking their electro-whips and shooting those who showed a lack of conviction in the back of their skulls.
